definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
John Paul (name)/Pope John Paul II, Karol Józef Wojtyła (1920-2005), Pope 1978-2005
Samuel Johnson (1709-1784) or Dr Johnson, English writer and lexicographer
pinyin: Sai1 miu4 er3 · Yue1 han4 xun4

definition: John Updike, US novelist (1932-2009), Pulitzer Prize winner
pinyin: Yue1 han4 · E4 pu3 dai4 ke4

definition: John Rabe (1882-1950), German who helped protect Chinese during the Nanking massacre period
John Bunyan (1628-1688), English puritan writer, author of Pilgrim's Progress 天路歷程|天路历程
John Hawkins (1532-1595), British seaman involved in sea war with Spain/Johns Hopkins (1795-1873), American entrepreneur, abolitionist and philanthropist

pinyin: Yue1 han4 · Huo4 jin1 si1 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 约翰意外获得一笔财富，使他夫人大吃一惊。

sentences.english: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
sentences.chinese: 他看见彼得约翰将要进殿，就求他们周济。

sentences.english: He has three good friends, such as Mary , Jhon.
sentences.chinese: 他有三个好朋友，如玛丽和约翰。

sentences.english: It covers what the apostle John saw in a vision on the Island of Patmos.
sentences.chinese: 它记录了使徒约翰在拔摩海岛所看到的异象。

sentences.english: We know it was written by a guy named John.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道它的作者是一个名叫约翰的人。

sentences.english: That's John. He lives with the Wang family.
sentences.chinese: 那是约翰，他和王家的人住一起。

sentences.english: When the jury pronounced him guilty of murder, john did not bat an eye.
sentences.chinese: 当陪审团宣判约翰犯有谋杀罪时，他面不改色。

sentences.english: Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖顶和圣约翰山高地后面的，是索瓦宁森林。

sentences.english: John's about to start a nine-week national speaking tour.
sentences.chinese: 约翰即将展开一场历时九周的全国巡回演讲。

sentences.english: John couldn't even pick up the box, much less carry it upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 约翰连这箱子提都提不起来，更别说把它搬上楼了。

sentences.english: I think there's a walleye on that one, " said Johnson."
sentences.chinese: “我认为有一个白斑上的，”约翰逊说。

sentences.english: At the last lap John held him,and then began to pick up on him.
sentences.chinese: 在最后一圈约翰追上了他，并开始超过他。

sentences.english: Mary is out of John's league.
John seemed to be off his feed, he did not joke and laugh with the others.
sentences.chinese: 约翰似乎有心事，他不跟别人说说笑笑。
